content: stitch from the sleeves back to the edge of the front and back pieces this is important for the set-in sleeve seam to look clean front piece k to m then k1 left sleeve onto stitch holder sl next sts until 1 st remaining before m 56 56 58 60 62 66 68 74 76 sts on hold for the left sleeve back piece onto another stitch holder sl 1 st sm sl next sts until m sm sl 1 st 71 74 77 83 90 101 108 120 129 sts on hold for the back piece right sleeve onto another stitch holder sl next sts until 1 st remaining before m 56 56 58 60 62 66 68 74 76 sts on hold for the right sleeve you will have 1 st unworked which is part of the front piece you should have 71 74 77 83 90 101 108 120 129 sts on the needles for the front piece remove all markers front piece setup row ws p to end turn *sizes 1 2 row 1 rs k2 m1l k until 2 sts remaining m1r k2 turn row 2 ws p to end turn repeat these two row 2 more times for size 1 you should have 77 sts break yarn for front piece and move on to back piece for size 2 you should have 80 sts do not break yarn continue below **sizes - 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 row 1 rs k2 m1l k until 2 sts remaining m1r k2 turn row 2 ws p2 m1rp p until 2 sts remaining m1lp p2 turn repeat these two row - 1 5 6 7 7 8 8 8 more times you should have - 88 101 111 122 133 144 156 165 sts break yarn and place front piece stitches on hold wan cheng phua © copyright 2024 knittygrittysg com back piece place the held back piece stitches onto needles setup row 1 rs k to end turn setup row 2 ws p to end turn for sizes 1 and 2 repeat from * section for sizes - - 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 repeat from ** section do not break yarn after the back piece continue below body you will join the back and front pieces together and knit in the round for the body knit 77 88 101 111 122 133 144 156 165 sts of back piece place marker continue by knitting across 77 88 101 111 122 133 144 156 165 sts of front piece join in the round and place beginning of round marker you should have 154 176 202 222 244 266 288 312 330 sts optional waist shaping knit 3 rounds of stockinette or until your knitting is at the widest part of the bust when tried on begin waist decreases below if you are using a plant fibre yarn that has no elasticity make sure to try on your tee after every decrease
